ul.li: Core Membership: Grey Owl, Scorpion, Stevie Whitefire
Primary Goal: Representation and protection of Native Americans
First Appearance: Offspring #1 (first mention), Blood Brothers Vol. 2 #? (first shown)

section.title: Description:
section.p: The Allied Tribes of America is a group dedicated to preserving and defending the way of life of Native Americans across North America. The current Chief of the Alliance is Grey Owl.

refbody.section:
History:
The first mention of the Allied Tribes of America was by Stevie Whitefire in his role as ambassador for the Tribes to the Holy War peace talks in Berlin. Stevie had been dispatched to the talks in order to gain some awareness from the factions involved in the Holy War that there was full-blown genocide against the Native American population of Canada. Unfortunately, the Earth Alliance (EA) would not recognize Stevie’s ambassadorial claims, and so relegated him to the observer’s galleries where he went on to meet the other members of the Offspring.
The PSF (see Blood Brothers) had a run-in with some members of the Allied Tribes in 2014, when they were called in to escort Gabriella Alvarez off American soil. As she was a guest of Stevie Whitefire and the Tribes, this did not go over well. However, she did consent to leave the US and everyone parted ways without a fight.
The Allied Tribes have become allies with the Faerie as they decided they had many common interests during the Holy War. This alliance still stands despite the end of the Holy War.
The Allied Tribes of America were created by Braz King..
